projects.title: Music@Brown
projects.description: A music recommendation platform for Brown students based on Spotify listening interests.

projects.title: Transforming SAR
projects.description: Software using Vision Transformers to accurately find humans in search and rescue operations.

projects.title: WeensyOS
projects.description: Toy OS implementing shared and read-only memory, forking and exiting, virtual page allocation, and overlapping virtual address spaces.

projects.title: Aging Eye Classification
projects.description: 1D CNN classifiers for predicting differential gene expression by age and sex across mice on eye data.

projects.title: DeepChrome Reimplementation
projects.description: 1D CNN, XGBoost, Random Forest, SVM classifiers for predicting gene expression from ChIP-seq data.
